title: Crystal Diaz, MD
author: Crystal Diaz; MD
sitename: Wake Forest University School of Medicine
cleaned_text: About Me I was born in New York but grew up in New Jersey and am the daughter of Dominican immigrants. I remained in New Jersey for school and attended Monmouth University, where I received a Bachelor of Science degree in chemistry with a minor in biology. I attended medical school at Rutgers New Jersey Medical School. I am fluent in Spanish and in my free time enjoy cooking, biking and spending time
